import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' const AddRJ = () => { const myrecipe=useContext(Reci) const setlogin=useContext(RecipesContext).setlogin const add=()=>{ let y=myrecipe axios.put('http://localhost:1234/Recipes/addRecipe',y).then(l=>{setmyrecipe(l.data)},alert("Added successfully")) } return (
setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,name:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,description:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,pic:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,level:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,duration:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,type:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,id:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...myrecipe,component:e.target.value})}> add()}>
) } export default AddRJ
